title: Noeury's Portfolio - Systems Engineer
description: Contact Noeury Feliz and start a unique journey together!
instructions: Checkout the <0>src/pages</0> directory to get started.<1><2>Code Challenge:</2> Translate this page with your language of choice.

AboutMe.paragraph1: My name is Noeury Feliz, but my friends simply call me Noeury. My programming journey began at the age of 15 while I was in high school. My first language back then was C#. Over the years, I've learned various technologies and led teams on some occasions.
AboutMe.paragraph2: One of my notable achievements was participating in the innovation competition organized by Mescyt, where I presented impactful projects.
AboutMe.paragraph3: I am currently working on some projects for the Universidad Católica Tecnológica de Barahona UCATEBA, where I have served as a SCRUM Master and team leader.

exp1.title: Multiple Projects
exp1.description: I am currently developing projects as a freelancer.

exp2.title: Backend Leader
exp2.description: Responsible for leading the backend development team, assuming the role of Scrum Master with its associated responsibilities, as well as implementing software solutions and databases.

hero.paragraph1: +5 years of experience. Systems Engineer, mathematics teacher, and former English teacher from Barahona, Dominican Republic. Currently dedicated to web application development.

nivelup.description: An application for student leveling at the University. This system constitutes a comprehensive academic management platform.

jen.description: Financial management platform and products for businesses with features such as point of sale, reports, payment and credit management.
